original_title: 機動戦士SDガンダムまつり
overview: The movie is divided into 3 different parts:  1) The Tale of the SD Warring States: World Peace Chapter  2) SD Gundam Sidestory: The Legend of the Holy Machine Soldiers  3) SD Commando War Chronicles: Gundam Force, Super G-Arms, Final Formula VS Noum Gyaza  (Source: Myanimelist.net)
title: Mobile Suit SD Gundam Festival
